summary: A powerful follower for difficult playthroughs.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][font=impact][color=#101371][size=30]EmmaFollower[/size][/color][/font][/u][/center]
[center] A powerful follower.[/center]

[center]<< [i]My first mod[/i] >>[/center]
[center]Good for use with mods that add more difficult enemies.[/center]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Contents:[/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-Details[/b]
[b]-Versions[/b]
[b]-Requirements[/b]
[b]-Compatibility[/b]
[b]-Recommendations[/b]
[b]-Feedback[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Details:[/u] [/color][/font][/size]
[center]All this mod adds is a female character that spawns in Dragonsreach near where [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Lydia]Lydia[/url] does. She is friendly and uses the voice acting from Lydia's character. She is your Housecarl and you have the option to have her follow you or not. She will go back to [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dragonsreach]Dragonsreach[/url], or your home, if you have one, when she leaves your service. You also have the option to marry her.[/center]
[list]
[b]-Wears [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ebony_Mail_(Skyrim)] Ebony Mail Armor[/url].[/b]
[b]-Has 2 [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedric_Sword]Daedric swords.[/url] One is enchanted with [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Fire_Damage_(Skyrim)]fire[/url] and one with [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Frost_Damage_(Skyrim)]ice[/url].[/b]
[b]-Has a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedric_Bow_(Skyrim)]Daedric bow[/url] enchanted with [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Fire_Damage_(Skyrim)]fire[/url], with [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedric_Arrow_(Skyrim)]Daedric arrows.[/url][/b]
[b]-Has a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedric_Shield_(Skyrim)]Daedric Shield[/url].[/b]
[b]-Levels up with player but will always have higher stats.[/b]
[/list]

[size=5][font=impact][color=#ec0000]Update: Version 2.5[/color][/font][/size]
[list]
-Fixed purple forehead issue.
[/list]


[size=5][font=impact][color=#ec0000]Update: Version 2.0[/color][/font][/size]
[center]<< I learned a lot more about character creation in the last few days... >>[/center]
[list]
-Daedric Bow now enchanted with flames.
-Daedric Swords now enchanted with fire and ice.
-Follower now able to dual wield swords.
-Added Daedric Shield. (Somehow it wasn't there before)
-Added Amulet of Mara.
-Added follower ability to shout. (Unrelenting force, Fire, Ice)
-Added a bunch of perks.
-Changed combat AI. (Now more likely to use swords than magica)
-Follower is now a bit more powerful overall. (Now 130% your level. Used to be 120%)
-Follower speed increased slightly. (105% your speed)
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Versions: [/u][/color][/font][/size]

[size=5][font=impact][color=#00aaee]Apachii Sky Hair Version[/color][/font][/size]

[list]
-Includes a really nice Apachii Sky Hair- hairstyle which looks the best.
-Must have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] Apachii Sky Hair [/url] installed.
[/list]

[size=5][font=impact][color=#dacc24]Vanilla Hair Version[/color][/font][/size]

[list]
-Uses a Vanilla Skyrim hairstyle. Doesn't look as good.
-Doesn't require any other mods to be installed.
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Requirements: [/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-A legal copy of the game. [/b][center][color=#f60000]SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS OF THE GREATEST GAME OF ALL TIME[/color][/center]
[b]-Must be running latest Skyrim Update.[/b]
[b]-If you are using the version of the mod that uses[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] Apachii Sky Hair [/url], obviously you need to have that installed. [/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Compatability: [/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-As far as I know, as long as you meet the mod requirements, there will be no issues.[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Recommendations: [/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-I highly recommend you use this mod with other mods that increase difficulty and add more enemies such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5485/?] Deadly Combat [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32597/?] Dragon Combat Overhaul [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41637/?] Swimming Enemies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35631/?] Monster Mod [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?] Immersive Creatures [/url], and[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40491/?] Revenge of the Enemies AI Overhaul[/url]. This is not required, however.[/b]
[b]-That way, your game will not become too easy even when your follower is very powerful.[/b]
[b]-I also recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37422/?] Amidianborn's Ebony Mail Armor Retexture [/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?] DIMONIZED UNP Female Body Replacer [/url] to make her look nicer. These are also not required.[/b]
[b]-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?] Amazing Follower Tweaks [/url] will greatly improve your follower experience.[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Feedback:[/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-This is my first mod so there may be issues.[/b]
[b]-If you encounter an issue, or have any suggestions, please contact me at [u][color=#b147da]thedrainnoodle@gmail.com[/color][/u][/b]
[b][i][color=#139005]~Thanks, if you like the mod, please endorse.[/color][/i][/b]
[/list]
author: The_Drainnoodle

-Added new version of mod that DOES NOT require Apachii Sky Hair. Uses a vanilla hairstyle instead.

-Added new version of mod that DOES NOT require Apachii Sky Hair. Uses a vanilla hairstyle instead.
